input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item keywords and item name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item name:
Equibarre with Angelea Kelly Walkup

Item keywords:
ballet barre style workout, enlongating muscles 
end goal is longer, toned body with a stronger core without adding bulk
does not require special gym equipment
easy to follow
can be adjusted to all levels of athletic abilities
Dancer, equestrian
Six segments: warm up, conditioning, flexibility
Customize daily workout
5 to 20 minutes

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This Equibarre with Angelea Kelly Walkup video is designed for dancers, equestrians, and anyone who wants to improve their flexibility and core strength. The video includes a warm-up, conditioning, and flexibility segments that can be customized to fit your needs. The end goal is to have a longer, toned body with a stronger core, without adding bulk. This workout does not require any special gym equipment and can be adjusted to all levels of athletic abilities. The total time commitment is 5 to 20 minutes. Angelea Kelly Walkup is a professional dancer and Equibarre certified instructor with over 20 years of experience. She is known for her dedication to helping her students achieve their fitness goals.
input_text.Response B:
Sure, here's a fun and engaging product description for the Equibarre with Angelea Kelly Walkup:

Introducing the Equibarre with Angelea Kelly Walkup - the ultimate ballet barre style workout that will transform your body into a long, lean, and toned masterpiece! 💪🏼💃

Say goodbye to bulky gym equipment and hello to a dancer's dream workout that will elongate your muscles, strengthen your core, and leave you feeling empowered and confident. 💃🏼💪🏼

Designed for all fitness levels, from beginners to pros, the Equibarre with Angelea Kelly Walkup is the perfect addition to your daily routine. With six segments - warm up, conditioning, flexibility, and customizable daily workouts that can be completed in just 5 to 20 minutes - you'll be on your way to a longer, stronger, and more toned body in no time! 💪🏼💃

Whether you're a dancer, equestrian, or just looking to improve your overall fitness and well-being, the Equibarre with Angelea Kelly Walkup has got you covered. With easy-to-follow instructions and adjustable intensity levels, you'll be able to tailor your workout to your specific needs and goals. 💪🏼💃

So why wait? Get ready to Equibarre with Angelea Kelly Walkup and experience the transformative power of ballet barre for yourself! 💃🏼💪🏼

Product Name: Equibarre with Angelea Kelly Walkup

Item Keywords: ballet barre style workout, elongating muscles, toned body, stronger core, no bulk, easy to follow, adjustable intensity levels, dancer, equestrian, customizable workouts, 5-20 minutes.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
